content.raw:
Jenkins job for Windows passed as well: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_plugin-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/53/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_plugin-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/53)

~~I’m not sure what caused the current “failure” status, but it looks like it’s a `java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException` which might be related to wiline?~~ A more recent Jenkins job [has passed](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_plugin-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/56/), so I think we can ignore the failure.
content.html:
Jenkins job for Windows passed as well: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_plugin-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/53/

I’m not sure what caused the current “failure” status, but it looks like it’s a java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException which might be related to wiline? A more recent Jenkins job has passed, so I think we can ignore the failure.
